abstract.t: This describes an experimental policy for use of the class D address space using 233/8 as the experimental statically assigned subset of the class D address space. This new experimental allocation is in addition to those described on [IANA] (e.g. [RFC2365]). This memo is a product of the Multicast-Address Allocation working group (MALLOC) in the Internet and Transport Areas of the Internet Engineering Task Force. Submit comments to <malloc@catarina.usc.edu> or the authors.
